fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Youth, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Cancer control, tobacco control, non communicable diseases (NCD), EU Joint Action on Cancer Control, EU Joint Action on Rare Cancers.  We are commissioned by the European Commission to communicate the European Code Against Cancer (www.cancercode.eu) through an EU Operating Grant.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: Dupont#Elisabeth, JOOSSENS#Luc, Mallafré Larrosa#Meritxell, Prokupkova#Anna, RITCHIE#David, TSE-YARED#Wendy

relevant_communication: As the official secretariat for the MEPs Against Cancer (MAC), we are responsible for organising all MAC events as per the MEPs and ECL members.  We are involved in all PR and communication activities related to cancer control including the Tobacco Products Directive, Alcohol Resolution, etc.
